duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide health promotion and maintenance through the diagnosis and treatment of acute illness and chronic conditions.
Prescribe medication, examine patients, diagnose illnesses, and provide treatment.
Advise executives to develop functional strategies on matters of significance.
Exercise independent judgment and decision-making on complex issues regarding job duties and related tasks.

education_certification.credential: Master's in Science of Nursing /PA-C (Bachelor's degree required)
